instruction: Generate a fake news story about aliens landing in the Swiss alps.
output:
Breaking News: Alien Spaceship Lands in the Swiss Alps!

In a stunning development, a UFO has been sighted landing in the Swiss Alps. Eyewitnesses report seeing a bright, silver object hovering in the sky before it descended into the mountain range, leaving a trail of smoke behind.

Authorities have confirmed that a large-scale search and rescue mission is currently underway to locate the alien craft and any potential extraterrestrial life forms that may have arrived with it. Swiss army helicopters and special forces teams have been dispatched to the area to investigate the situation and secure the site.

The Swiss government has issued a statement urging citizens to remain calm and stay indoors until further notice. They have also advised anyone who may have witnessed the incident to contact authorities immediately.

Speculation is rampant as to the origin and intentions of the alien visitors. Some are speculating that they may have come in peace, while others are expressing concern about the potential threat they could pose to humanity.

instruction:
Rewrite the following sentence using a more sophisticated phrase than “very happy”:
I am very happy about my new job
output: I am ecstatic about my new job.

instruction: Write a script for a 20-second monologue.
output: Hello everyone! Life is full of ups and downs, but I believe that every day is an opportunity to make something great. Time flies quickly, so make the most of today and do something special. Make it a day that you'll be proud of when you look back at it! Thank you!

instruction: Given a list of characters and actions, organize the characters and actions into an entertaining storyline.
input:
Characters: Sheryl - lawyer, Sarah - engineer, Tom - detective
Actions: Win the lottery, Stop a bank robbery, Invent a new technology
output: Sheryl is a lawyer who wins the lottery one day and decides to use her newfound wealth to travel the world. During her travels, she meets Sarah, an engineer who has invented a revolutionary new technology. Sheryl and Sarah team up to help stop a local bank robbery. With their combined problem solving skills, they manage to thwart the criminal and ensure the safety of everyone in the bank. Tom, a detective from the local police force, comes to thank them for their help. In the end, Sheryl and Sarah use their newfound notoriety to help promote the revolutionary new technology to the world.

instruction: Create a sentence that properly combines the adverbs drastically and gradually.
output: His grades drastically improved as he gradually put in more effort and dedication.

instruction: Given a list of musical instruments, instruments, write some lyrics that feature each instrument.
output:
The strum of the guitar, the gentle bow of the viola, the beat of the drums - 
We come together to create a harmony that thrums. 
The guitar strums a rhythm, the viola plays a tune, the drums fill the heart with a merry tune. 
Bringing joy and a spark of delight, 
Let's thread together music through the night.

instruction: Write a poem about the Earth and its beauty.
output:
Our magnificent Earth, its beauty sure to last; 
Its long-reaching oceans and its mountains vast. 
Its many wonders and its varied cultures, 
Its breathtaking views and its endless features. 
Its sun-sparkled skies and its fragrant blooms, 
Its forests deep and abundant plumes. 
Its creations so diverse, its life the same; 
Our Earth is precious, its beauty aflame.

instruction: Write an instruction for a game of Jeopardy using the following topics:  Astronomy, Math, and Geology.
output: The rules are as follows: for Astronomy, Math, and Geology, players will provide an answer in the form of a question. Each correct answer gives a certain amount of points, and the player with the highest points at the end wins.

instruction: Translate the following sentence into French: I wanted to go for a walk.
output: Je voulais aller me promener.

instruction: Given a few simple ingredients, come up with a unique recipe.
output: Banana Oat Breakfast Bowl: In a blender, combine 1/2 cup oats, one banana, and 1/2 cup yogurt. Blend until smooth. Pour the mixture into two individual bowls. Toppings of your choice (blueberries, almonds, coconut flakes) optional. Enjoy!

instruction: Determine the cost of shipping a package from New York to Chicago.
output: The cost of shipping a 10 lb package from New York to Chicago will be approximately $29.90.

instruction: Evaluate the following argument: The government should increase taxes to help fund the public health care system.
output: I believe that the government should increase taxes to help fund the public health care system. Healthcare is a basic human right, and building and maintaining a strong public healthcare system is essential to providing a quality health care system. Increasing taxes can help raise the funds needed to improve access to healthcare and cover medical costs. Furthermore, healthcare is a major expense and new taxes can help distribute the burden of healthcare costs among all taxpayers. Thus, increasing taxes to fund the public health care system is the best option.

instruction: Identify the theme in the following passage about a family reunion
input: The Smith family had been planning their reunion for months, and when the day arrived, it was a happy, boisterous occasion. The youngest members of the family ran around laughing and playing. The older members reminisced about past reunions and laughed at the stories they shared. Everyone cherished the time they had together and wanted it to last as long as possible.
output: The theme of the passage is cherishing family togetherness.

instruction: Write a story of no more than 150 words about a knight who defends their kingdom from a dragon.
output:
The young knight looked out from the castle walls, surveying the kingdom that he had been tasked with defending. He tightened his grip on the sword in his hand as he heard the distant roar of the dragon. It seemed like this would be the day that the dragon of terror would be brought to justice.

The knight braced himself as the creature flew into view, spewing fire and causing chaos. The knight drew his sword and charged into battle. He hacked and slashed at the dragon, determined to save his beloved kingdom. After a long and difficult fight, the dragon was slain. The kingdom cheered and the knight proudly returned to the castle, sword in hand and the dragon's scales draped over his shoulders.

instruction: Rearrange the text to create an appropriate title for the article.
input:
The Rise of Online Shopping

Shopping is Changing and Increasingly Digital
output: Online Shopping on the Rise: How Shopping Is Changing and Going Digital

instruction: Assemble the pieces of the sentence in the proper order.
output: The black and white cat.

instruction: Generate a single sentence containing the three words provided.
output: I hiked to the mountain summit and was greeted by a meadow full of colorful wildflowers.

instruction: Name the type of sentence used in the sentence provided.
input: I'm in love with the color blue.
output: Declarative sentence.

instruction: Leading with a boss can be challenging. Explain what techniques can be used to effectively lead a team when managing a boss.
output: Leading a team when managing a boss can be challenging but there are steps that can be taken to ease this process. It is important to have a clear understanding of expectations, roles and responsibilities; take initiative by suggesting ideas or solutions, set priorities and manage time efficiently; listen and acknowledge feedback; and provide praise and recognition. Above all, it is essential to maintain respectful communication and find ways to encompass the boss’ goals and ideas into the team’s strategies.

instruction: Given a customer query, predict whether the customer is likely to buy from us.
input: The customer asked about the cost and availability of a product.
output: Yes, the customer is likely to buy from us.

instruction: Given a description of a person's physical appearance, generate a character description fitting the provided description.
output: Bob was a well-built man standing at 5'6" tall. His head glowed with a brilliant silver halo of hair and his eyes glowed a brilliant violet. His skin was tan and weathered, like a man comfortable with the outdoors. He wore blue overalls and a worn work shirt, his hands calloused and his nails short.

instruction: Rate the following article from 1 to 5, with 5 being the highest.
input: This article provides an overview of the many different aspects of the 2020 US election.

instruction: Correct the following sentence: He got that job becaus of of his credentials.
output: He got that job because of his credentials.

instruction: Complete the grid with numbers in ascending order.
Classify the following paragraph into one of the three categories (Natural Disaster, Health Crisis, International Conflict).
input: With the recent outbreak of the Coronavirus, medical facilities across the world have been scrambling to meet the needs of the population.
output: Health Crisis.
